original_text: But when they heard that he was alive and had been seen by her, they would not believe it.
korean_text: 그들은 예수께서 살아나셨다는 것과 마리아에게 보이셨다는 것을 듣고도 믿지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: But when they heard that he was alive and had been seen by her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 그가 살아 있고 그녀에게 보였다는 것을 들었을 때,
